CIDA SAS Macros

Last updated: 2025-04-18

sas-macros.Rmd

List of SAS macros

SAS macros in CIDAtools can be searched below, and their source code is available here.

name keywords
create_cida_project.sas CIDA project, folder organization, new project
test1.sas test, not useful, delete later
test2.sas test, nothing
